version_description:
★ Invite your friends and win free icons!
★ New "Cartoon Animals" pack!
★ New free flag pack!
★ More 3D Word Art!
★ Updated for iPhone 5

* 4 new icon packs: Food, Travel, Home, Religion!
* Now you can easily post to Facebook and Twitter
* You no longer have to paste your icons into the Messages app! Just press "Send", and then tap "Messages".

* Make your own custom emojis! You can use your own photos, or pictures from the web. (See below for instructions.)
* 16 new backgrounds!
* Now supports other popular messaging apps (Press "Send", then scroll to "More Apps").
* Bug fixes

How to create your own emoji:
--------------------------
(1) Find a picture that you want to turn into an emoji. Transparent PNGs work best. Save it to your camera roll.
(2) In the Big Emoji app, tap "More", then "Create/Share Emoji", the "Load Photo", and choose the picture. (Crop/zoom it if you want.)
(3) Choose a "slot" where you want to store the emoji.
(4) Now go back to the main screen, and check out your Custom Emoji pack (it's the one with the dotted circle icon). You can text with this new emoji like you normally would.

- New emojis pack free for everyone!
- Sticker mode! Send them with a cool sticker look.
- When you win an emoji in the slot machine, you can choose to keep it or not.

Did you know you can make custom emoji, and from the More->Create/Share screen you can send them to your friends so they can use them too?

We appreciate your support - help us by leaving a detailed review for Big Emoji Stickers!

Thanks - Mark & Rob.

- New emojis pack free for everyone!
- Sticker mode! Send them with a cool sticker look.
- When you win an emoji in the slot machine, you can choose to keep it or not.

Did you know you can make custom emoji, and from the More->Create/Share screen you can send them to your friends so they can use them too?

We appreciate your support - help us by leaving a detailed review for Big Emoji Stickers!

Thanks - Mark & Rob.

- Emoji Newsfeed! Get some new free emojis every week.
- Want an emoji you made to appear on everyone's Emoji Newsfeed? Just email us!
- Everyone can have 6 saved emojis for free.
- You can now buy up to 40 extra slots for saved emojis.
- Fixed notifications on iOS8 for your free slot machine spins.
- You can gift your saved emojis to your friends. In the main app go to the 'More' menu, then Create & Gift Emoji.

Thanks for your support, please tell your friends and keep the app store reviews coming!
Mark & Rob

- BIGGER and better quality emoji stickers!
- Added loads of new smiley faces for FREE.
- Now easily send to iMessage, Facebook & Messenger, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp, WeChat, Kik, Snapchat, Line, Weibo, ...
- Cute new characters added in 7 new emoji packs!
- Create your own emojis from photos - emojify your friends! (Look in the More menu.)

Please add a review if you like Big Emoji. It really helps us, and tell your friends too!

Cheers, Mark & Rob.

- Invite Facebook friends to get more free spins.
- Now works with Facebook Messenger too!

Thanks for all the great reviews - keep 'em coming.
Mark & Rob.

* Fixed crash on startup some users reported (sorry).
* Fixed a keyboard bug where sometimes emoji would not paste into Messages
* Taco Emoji! New rainbow background!
* Fixed a bug where the Big Emoji icon would sometimes show a "2" badge when we really only meant "1" free emoji. (Might take a couple days for you to see the correct badge number on the icon.)

- Christmas emoji pack added.
- Fixed crashing on startup bug.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Fixed a bug with purchases of stickers packs.
